questCraftDescription: An AI-powered engine for creating educational board games. Play a quest, or create your own!
urlPlaceholder: Paste Gist or raw JSON URL...
createNewQuestDescription: Use the AI-powered Quest Maker wizard.
readTheDocsDescription: Learn about QuestCraft, the schema, and more.
step1Description: Tell our AI game designer what your quest is about. Be descriptive for the best results, or click "Enhance" and let the AI help you!
ideaPlaceholder: e.g., A game about the challenges of being a freelance artist, balancing project deadlines, client satisfaction, and personal finances.
enhanceTooltip: Use AI to improve and expand your idea
scenariosPerLocationHint: 0-3. AI writes stories for properties. More takes longer.
groundInRealityHint: If checked, AI will use web search to generate scenarios from real-world events.
groundInRealityModelHint: For best results, select a model with web search in Settings (e.g., Google Gemini, or search-enabled models from OpenRouter).
writingStoriesDescription: Generating {numScenarios} scenario(s) for each Property and Utility space. This may take a moment.
resetStatsDescription: Resets the token counter, cost estimate, and game timer displayed in the status bar.
resetAppDescription: Resetting will delete all saved custom quests, AI audit logs, and usage statistics from your browser. This action cannot be undone.
auditLogDescription: Logs of all requests to the AI provider. Most recent are at the top.
noLogs: No logs yet. Generate a quest or a dynamic scenario to see logs here.
aiDisconnected: AI Connection Failed or Not Tested
gameOverMessage: Congratulations, {winnerName}, you have won the quest!
choosePathDescription: This place has a story to tell. Do you want to experience the pre-written narrative, or use AI to generate a completely new, unpredictable event?
